comments.body: This is tricky to test. As is the test will always pass, but it will fail with the old code and a sleep in the goroutine that triggers the race.

My issue with this approach is that, while you effectively test the expiration mechanism, you don't test that the expiration happens on the correct condition (time elapsed). So you need to at least test TTLPolicy with a fake clock (see the util package, I think it has one).
testing TTLPolicy in same file now
